transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Oh yeah.
Speaker A: Hello. Hello.
Speaker B: Yes. Yes.
Speaker A: Yeah. Am I speaking at Saravan Lakshmi Naranya? Hello?
Speaker B: Yes. Yes sir, you're right.
Speaker A: Yeah, this is Trisha actually calling you from Amber Student and we are the official accommodation partner for University College London. I can see that you're inquiring about booking an accommodation. Correct. Like.
Speaker B: Yes, you're right.
Speaker A: So have you finalized any property yet?
Speaker B: No, not yet. But I mean private bathroom in the room.
Speaker A: And what is the budget that you are planning? So like what's your budget for accommodation for four weeks?
Speaker B: Something like that. £290 in a week.
Speaker A: Can you please come again? I wasn't able to hear that.
Speaker B: Yeah. £290 a week.
Speaker A: £290 per week. Correct.
Speaker B: Yes. Yes sir.
Speaker A: So private washroom is mandatory for you or like you are comfortable with sharing?
Speaker B: Yeah, yeah. Private bath, private bathroom is. Yeah, it's required. I mean there's a common. Kitchen is fine, kitchen is not a problem. But. But we like to have a room with the private bathroom.
Speaker A: And you want it near ucl, correct?
Speaker B: Yeah, she's going to be in Canary.
Speaker A: Okay. Is it Canary or campus, not Bloomsbury. I'll do one thing here. I'll give you a WhatsApp call because I'm not able to hear you very clearly. There might be some network issues over there. I'll give you a WhatsApp. Okay.
Speaker B: Yeah. Okay, thank you.

Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Yeah, hello, am I speaking with Sharavanand here? Yes, yeah, this is actually from Amber Student. He spoke earlier regarding the accommodation.
Speaker A: Yeah, exactly. Yeah, hello, thanks for calling me. I just want to inform you I think we. We are going it with this UCL accommodation for your information. Yeah, I just want to inform you.
Speaker B: Has she got a place in the UCL accommodation as well?
Speaker A: Yes, yes.
Speaker B: And which property that she has for like the property name?
Speaker A: I don't remember. I. I need to see that because she, she said that she received it so I said that maybe I need to check it out.
Speaker B: Okay, that's not an issue. You can just let me know on the WhatsApp. I. I'm hoping that you do have my WhatsApp number, correct?
Speaker A: Yes, I have your WhatsApp number. So if anything we are going to change and I will definitely let you know basically.
Speaker B: Okay, thank.
Speaker A: You.
